wplace_bot.name: wplace-bot
wplace_bot.title: Wplace Bot - Automated Pixel Art Creation for WPlace.live
wplace_bot.description: Automate your WPlace.live pixel art creation with Wplace Bot - a powerful browser-based automation tool for efficient and precise collaborative pixel art projects.

hero.title: Wplace Bot
hero.subtitle: Automated Pixel Art Creation for WPlace.live
hero.description: Transform your collaborative pixel art workflow with intelligent automation. Wplace Bot provides advanced scripting capabilities, queue management, and precision placement for large-scale community art projects.

tools.title: WPlace AutoBOT by DarkModde
tools.description: A comprehensive open-source automation bot for WPlace.live featuring advanced pixel placement algorithms, template support, and intelligent queue management. This GitHub repository provides a complete solution for automated pixel art creation with detailed documentation and community support.

tools.description: Explore a curated collection of WPlace bot projects, scripts, and automation tools developed by the community. safety.title: Wplace Bot Safety & Best Practices
safety.description: Important guidelines for responsible automation usage

guidelines.title: Respect Community Rules
guidelines.description: Always follow WPlace.live's Terms of Service and community guidelines when using automation tools.

guidelines.title: Use Reasonable Speeds
guidelines.description: Configure realistic placement speeds that don't overwhelm the server or appear obviously automated.

guidelines.title: Coordinate with Others
guidelines.description: Communicate with other community members to avoid conflicts and ensure collaborative success.

guidelines.title: Monitor Your Bot
guidelines.description: Regularly check on your bot's operation to ensure it's working correctly and not causing issues.

items.question: Is using Wplace Bot allowed on WPlace.live?
items.answer: The use of automation tools may violate WPlace.live's Terms of Service. Always check the current rules and use automation responsibly. Consider the impact on other users and the community.

items.question: How fast can Wplace Bot place pixels?
items.answer: Placement speed depends on WPlace.live's cooldown timers and your configuration. The bot respects cooldowns and can be configured for natural-looking placement patterns.

items.question: Can I use Wplace Bot with multiple accounts?
items.answer: While technically possible, using multiple accounts may violate platform rules. Always check the Terms of Service and consider the ethical implications of multi-account usage.

items.question: Is Wplace Bot free to use?
items.answer: Pricing varies by provider. Some offer free tiers with limited features, while advanced features may require subscription. Check the specific bot provider for current pricing.

items.question: How do I avoid getting banned while using automation?
items.answer: Use realistic timing, avoid obvious patterns, respect cooldowns, and don't place pixels too quickly. However, remember that automation always carries some risk of detection.

items.question: Can Wplace Bot work with any image?
items.answer: Most bots support common image formats (PNG, JPEG) and automatically convert colors to match WPlace.live's palette. Complex images may need preprocessing for best results.
